document.full_text: nokia and siemens are letting two private equity consortia look at the books of nokia siemens networks as they try to sell the joint venture, three people familiar with the matter said.
document.title: private equity in talks for nokia siemens: sources
lines_and_colors: nokia and siemens are letting two private equity consortia look at the books of nokia siemens networks as they try to sell the joint venture, three people familiar with the matter said.
